bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: NPE when converting some column statistics
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.2.0 Describe the bug Some column statistics from hive UDB will throw a NPE. To Reproduce Sync a database with a table that has column statistics. Some of the column types like decimal may hit a NPE. Expected behavior No NPE is thrown. Urgency This prevents some tables to be synced.
